column66: Based on most counties’ transit systems and the information from Alabama’s Department of Transport, no plans to suspend transport services were in place. column104: Governor Charlie Baker issued COVID-19 Order 31 requiring everyone to wear a mask in public including public transportation starting Wednesday, May 6, 2020. column108: Public transportation agencies in Pennsylvania have continued operating through the COVID-19 pandemic.
